CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Abacus Life, Inc. is a buyer of life insurance policies and a vertically integrated alternative asset manager specializing in specialty insurance products. The Company purchases life insurance policies from consumers seeking liquidity and manages those policies over time through trading, holding, and/or servicing. The Company offers a full turn-key solution to agents and brokers, including medical records retrieval, illustration requests, and licensing support. It provides online tools to qualify and an easy on-boarding process with single-page application, HIPAA, and insurance release. It conducts life settlement business in the green states. It helps clients to maximize the value of their life insurance. The Company has an institutionalized origination and portfolio management process. The Company manages assets for asset managers and third-party investment funds. It operates in about 49 states.
